name: Innovative Communication Systems
tagline: Live IT, Breathe IT, Manage IT
description:
Innovative Communication Systems is a full service, family owned, business technology provider that has been leading the way since 1981.Â 
Founded on the principal that office technology products must not only be functional but also increase productivity and offer a solid return on investment. This principal, backed with a thorough commitment to integrity and ethical business practices, has earned ICS a reputation as being one of the most reliable service providers in the industry.
